name: Presidents Summit
slogan: Connecting Leaders Who Shape the Future
description:
Presidents Summit is a global network of CEOs, Business Owners and Senior Executives committed to becoming better leaders. The founding idea was to create the best executive community in the world. 

Twice a year, we host Presidents Summit, which is the largest executive conference in Europe and brings the world’s leading CEO’s and thinkers from business, academia, entrepreneurship, and politics to the stage. Names like Bill Clinton, Richard Branson, Gary Vaynerchuk, Jack Welch, Mitt Romney, and Steve Wozniak, as well as +125 other top speakers, have stood on the stage to share their insights. We strive to enable our members to advance their career and leadership capabilities through peer-to-peer learning, executive education, and world-leading summits.

jobs.title: Sponsorship Sales Executive
jobs.description:
Description
We are looking for a new Sales Executive who can grow our sponsorship sales for Presidents Summit. The Summit is the leading executive conference in Northern Europe which attracts 2,000 business leaders and speakers such as Bill Clinton, Richard Branson, Jack Welch, and Steve Wozniak.

You will be responsible for managing the sale of top-level sponsorship packages with major international companies such as Deloitte, Lamborghini, and Coca-Cola. You will be working closely with the Events Director, and other key stakeholders to deliver cutting-edge, best-in-class ROI for our sponsors.

Responsibility
 - Identifying new business and sponsorship opportunities
 - Making outgoing sales calls to potential or existing customers
 - Creating proposals and pitches for potential exhibitors and sponsors
 - Working closely with the operations team and marketing team to ensure sponsor’s rights and benefits are properly implemented and delivered
 - Developing and maintaining relationships with key accounts, existing, new and lapsed clients ensuring maximum spend and involvement at Presidents Summit

Requirements
We are located in London, United Kingdom, and look for someone who...
 - Has experience with B2B sales
 - Enjoys networking and building long-term relationships with corporate clients
 - Has an ability to understand client needs and adopt a tailored approach
 - Is motivated by targets and always aiming to smash them
 - Is coachable, with the willingness and humility to learn from feedback
 - Is looking to work in a fast-paced entrepreneurial environment
 
This is a fantastic opportunity for an ambitious individual who can help grow 
the business. You will immediately become an integral part of a team where responsibility comes as standard and your career path is up to you. If you'd like to know more, please send a CV now.

jobs.title: Sponsorship Sales Director
jobs.description:
Do you have two years of direct B2B sales experience and now interested in building your own sales team at a fast growing company with an entrepreneurial environment? We are looking for a new Sales Director to take on our annual Presidents Summit, which gathers 2,000 business leaders and speakers such as Bill Clinton, Richard Branson, Jack Welch, and Steve Wozniak.


You will be responsible for managing the sale of top-level sponsorship packages with major global companies (€30k+) such as Deloitte, Lamborghini, and Coca-Cola. You’ll work closely with the Events Director, and other key stakeholders to deliver cutting-edge, best-in-class ROI for our sponsors.


RESPONSIBILITY
- Identifying new business and sponsorship opportunities
- Making outgoing sales calls to potential or existing customers
- Creating proposals and pitches for potential exhibitors and sponsors
- Working closely with the operations team and marketing team to ensure sponsor’s rights and benefits are properly implemented and delivered
- Developing and maintaining relationships with key accounts, existing, new and lapsed clients ensuring maximum spend and involvement at Presidents Summit

REQUIREMENTS
- We are located in London, United Kingdom, and look for someone who…
- Has two years of experience with B2B sales
- Sales leader background ideal with proven track record of excellent yield management
- Enjoys networking and building long-term relationships with corporate clients
- Has an ability to understand client needs and adopt a tailored approach
- Is motivated by targets and always aiming to smash them
- Is coachable, with the willingness and humility to learn from feedback
- Is looking to work in a fast-paced entrepreneurial environment


This is a fantastic opportunity for an ambitious individual who can help grow the business. You will immediately become an integral part of a team where responsibility comes as standard and your career path is up to you. If you’d like to know more, please send a CV now.
